snippet.title: The Elysian Fields for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---

Game description:

The Elysian Fields is a graphical text-adventure based of the Greek mythology.
Encounter gods like Zeus, Athena, Hephaestus etc. as well as hostile monsters, like the flesh-eating Stygian birds, a harpy or a siren.

What I think:

Well, I found this to be rather fun, but I am a fan of the Greek mythology, so it's no wonder. 
However, people who aren't interested in the Greek mythology probably won't find this to be fun, as they have no idea who are all those gods and monsters are.
